text:
Hey fellow devs :wave: ,
I run a small HubSpot design and development agency <https://pixllabs.io/> and I'm looking for a part-time HubSpot developer to join the team. We are looking to scale and grow a team of talented developers. If you are looking to freelance, shoot me a message and we can discuss more details.
Do you have a lot of experience with the custom code feature in HubSpot?

Hi Brandon
Yep, no worries about that.
I have proven experience with it.

Hi, everybody.
Here is Giovanni from Canada and 30 years old.
I am very excited to join this group and very impressive.
I'm a full-stack blockchain developer with 7 of experience in skill areas.
I recently worked on <https://opacity.io> and I successfully finished my project.
If anybody wants, I'll attach my resume and look forward to hearing from you.
Thank you.
